attributes.review: This app made me lose a leg. When I downloaded it i saw a picture of a really disgusting and smelly and rotten cheetos it was so bad it gave me chills and when the bad luck started happening i lost my fingers to a crocodile i typing this with the crocodiles fingers so then i just kept going and acted like nothing happened but then i saw a really deadly snake and it ate my legs off now i only have my upper body but i still didn’t care and and waited the next day but then i woke up and my arms were cut off but I don’t know what cut it off but then I didn’t care and now OMG OMG OMG i see the crocodile and it’s family coming after me haaaaaaa they are eating me haa-
attributes.title: This app gave me so much BAD LUCK I’m currently in the hospital

attributes.review: I was greeted with a d pic.a small one. He said I have corona don’t tell. 👹👹👹👹. He turns into that. He was like let’s get freaky. I said never fatty he said I will find your house I am like you will get fired🤢🤢. Then he left me and said if I didn’t want him he will give me this. 😧😧😧he gave me a pic of him smiling and in the back a little kid with tape one her mouth nailed to the floor try to scream. 😫😫😫😫😫😫😫I AM TRAUMATIZED. Plz tell me your story. And he said watch me p and I said no and deleted the appppppppp
attributes.title: Aaaaaaa nooooo

attributes.review: it was on the fateful day of july 8, 2020 that the sheer evil energy of boredom got the best of me. never have i ever been so near the brink of death or worse without knowing a thing. a hellish acidic feeling met my fingers the second they opened the app, causing all eleven of them to melt away instantly, hitting the carpet below with a splash. a petrifying scream echoed across the now silent walls of my house as my poor, innocent, virgin eyes were met with a monster like no other. molding yellow was it's pasted on scalp. a body- if you would call it that- as if inflated with its own ego. mole like eyes the color of vomit glinted through layers upon layers of skin. the skin was the worst part. the color of the sunset on the last day of earth, polluted with smoke. the color so deep and sickening i puked all over my own phone screen. all senses lost, i ran as far away as i could before my eyes melted into tears, followed by the rest of my body. i woke up in the hospital a few months later, barely clinging to life. save yourself before it's too late.
attributes.title: life changing for the worse

attributes.review: i got this app to support but when i went to my camera roll after, pictures of trump just started flooding in and i don’t know how they got there! so i decided to jump off a cliff only to land onto a cheeto floaty that was floating in the river below. i got off and then i started running and running and running, before realizing that i was on a never ending treadmill. so i simply stepped off but then i got abducted by aliens. these aliens gave me mac n cheese and some mashed potatoes which was very yummy. i decided to leave earth with these aliens since i could not live on earth anymore with the photos of trump engraved in my mind. but the atmosphere would not let us leave so we had to make an emergency landing back on earth. when we landed there was this huge banner of trump looking like a centaur greeting us. i lost my mind and decided to jump off the same cliff that i did before. i could not take it anymore, this all happened because of this app and i cannot take it anymore. so unfortunate, but it’s for the best ❤️
attributes.title: no no no

attributes.review: i got the app with good intentions after jessica sat me down at book 📙club. she said it would be a fun experience 🤪to see our lord and savior 🙏, so i downloaded it but ended up falling asleep🥱 😴. i woke up to my alarm clock ⏰ in the morning and my kids 👶🏻👶🏼👧🏽👧🏾👧🏿 jumping on my bed 🛌 . i turned to my left to the CHEETO MAN 👨 ?! i thought my eyes were deceiving me but he gets up to go to my restroom 🚽 💩and i could see that he was COMPLETELY NAKED 🙀 the first thing that came up in my head was the app 😧i quickly deleted it while my kids were crying 😞as a result to seeing a small cheeto hanging from the cheeto man 👨 i looked up and everything was back to normal. ☺️ moral of the story is DO NOT GET THIS APP 😡🤬!!
attributes.title: i AM karen

attributes.review: I rate this app a ONE STAR. First off, i logged into my account and saw a man dressed in NAZI UNDERWEAR. As a Jewish American, I am very hurt. I kept scrolling and ended up on a picture with the caption “Would F%#* my daughter any day” I’m appalled. This is NOT my president. This app is totally not for kids, I let my 6 year old child have my phone and when she opened the app, she saw Trump naked next to his own naked statue. Say the less, she threw up all her clementines and it was a very disturbing evening. Totally not kid friendly. When I went to delete the app off my phone, it glitched and made my lock screen a picture of a headless bird🤮. I hate america. After all this madness, a man SHOT my raccoon. This is so unbelievable. ONE STAR.
attributes.title: Totally gross 🤮

attributes.review: I opened the app to see a horrific looking Cheeto creature. It asked for my phone number which I feel is 💯 a invasion of privacy and I am very uncomfortable and will be buying a new phone now. It asked me to share with friends which also made me very scared! Why do they need to know who my friends are? Are they going to come and hurt me or them? I don’t trust it. It asks for too much and I already 𝓫𝓵𝓮𝓼𝓼𝓮𝓭❤️🧡💛💚💙💜🖤🤍🤎it with my download. Then out of no where my house caught on FIRE🔥🔥🔥 the only explanation for that would be this app. So therefore I do not want to see it on the app store any longer to prevent house fires!🧚‍♀️🌈💯😗🌲🐙🎉 Thank you have a great day!🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈
attributes.title: 𝓘 𝓷𝓮𝓮𝓭 𝓽𝓱𝓮𝓻𝓪𝓹𝔂 𝓷𝓸𝔀🥰😗✌️🧚‍♀️

attributes.review: Yesterday, as i was walking my scarecrow, this app started making noises. it scared my scarecrow into being approachable, and it rendered my sister and grandmother deaf. we would go to the hospital and get their situation checked out, but the cheeto took away basic human healthcare rights so now they just have to live with hearing condition this app gave them 😔. Today it opened itself and upon looking at my phone, i saw the most hideous orange ever known. it was so hideous I had to go get my eyes checked out and now i wear glasses and am legally blind. my mother wasn’t so fortunate and cannot see at all now. I go to therapy for all the trauma this app gave me and I DO NOT RECOMMEND GETTING IT. 😾😾😾😾😾
attributes.title: If i could rate this 0 stars, i would

attributes.review: I really hate apps that are extremely slow and non functions, it really irritates me. This app especially, it represents racist behavior, misogyny, and so much more. The graphics on this app also are really old and unappealing for anyone in general. Screams I’m too old to act like a 5 year old even though I am in my 70s. Actually wait, most 5 year old are way more mature than that this app represents. I really really encourage this app to be taken down from here because it truly is not giving anyone any good. If you cannot see that please reevaluate your beliefs and morals please for the sake of our world. Take this app down immediately, cannot be trusted.
attributes.title: do not recommend, slow & corrupt

attributes.review: No as soon as I opened the app, my dog ran out of the house. She got hit by a car. Then my mom ran out of the house after the dog, she also got hit by a car. My grandma heard the noises and bodies hitting the floor and had also ran out. A tree fell on her. Then my dad was going to call an ambulance then got electrocuted because he was washing his hands in the sink. Then both my brother and sister ran to the living room but then died because they slipped on the water that was on the floor and hit their heads really hard on each other. Now I’m an orphan and have to take care of all this now. All BECAUSE OF TRUMPS STUPID APP. HES LIKE FINAL DESTINATION ON CRACK BUT WORSE! Anyways 10/10 would not recommend not even to my worst enemy!!! 🤮 🤢
attributes.title: No✨😌❤️🥵
